auth.joinUs: Join us and start building your brand
auth.loginSubtitle: Transform your ideas into amazing products
auth.loginErrorMessage: Incorrect email or password. Please try again.

productCategories.title: What type of products would you like to create?
productCategories.description: Choose the categories that interest you most

beverages.title: Beverages
beverages.description: Create your own line of premium beverages, from coffee to ready-to-drink products

supplements.title: Supplements
supplements.description: Develop high-quality vitamins, minerals, and nutritional supplements

beauty.title: Beauty & Personal Care
beauty.description: Design innovative skincare, haircare, and body care products

sportsNutrition.title: Sports Nutrition
sportsNutrition.description: Launch your own sports supplements, from protein powders to pre-workouts

petCare.title: Pet Care
petCare.description: Create premium pet supplements and wellness products

profileType.title: Tell us about yourself
profileType.description: Select the option that best describes you
profileType.creatorDescription: I create content and have an engaged audience
profileType.entrepreneurDescription: I'm building or expanding my business
profileType.marketerDescription: I work with digital marketing and brand growth

brandStatus.title: Where are you in your brand journey?
brandStatus.description: Help us understand your current situation

options.noBrandDescription: I have an idea but haven't started developing my brand
options.partialBrandDescription: I have some branding elements but need to complete them
options.completeBrandDescription: I have a complete brand identity ready to go

launchUrgency.title: What's your target launch timeline?
launchUrgency.description: This helps us prepare the best strategy for your needs

options.immediateDescription: I want to launch quickly and am ready to move fast
options.soonDescription: I'm planning for a launch in the next few months
options.planningDescription: I'm in the early planning stages
